doctor.name: Dr. Bablu Kumar Paul
doctor.info: Dr. Bablu Kumar Paul is a Kidney Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Nephrology). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Nephrology at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Moon Hospital, Comilla.
